data.author: Dan Peck
data.title: Hurricane Hanna makes landfall around 5 p.m. on Saturday.
data.description: Hurricane Hanna battered southern Texas with sustained winds of 75 mph and continued to deliver heavy rain and flash flooding as it moved inland late Saturday.

data.author: TMZ Staff
data.title: Nicki Minaj's Husband Gets Permission To Be There For Baby's Birth
data.description: Kenneth can be in the room when Nicki gives birth ... a judge just granted his request to tweak his pre-trial release conditions so he can travel with Nicki. With the court's order in place, KP can travel with Nicki periodically on biz…

data.author: Michael Rothstein
data.title: New Lions safety Jayron Kearse suspended three games
data.description: Kearse, 26, signed with the Lions in March after four seasons in Minnesota, where he played in 62 games with five starts, making 79 tackles and defending eight passes.
